channel.title: Project Snow Can u Handle it?
channel.description:
[B]I well be updating this thread every hour or so![/B]
[CODE]Well Im finally moving on....From delta..........To Pali's Battlescape base i heard its very good So if u would like to be a part of this project just follow directions below :D[/CODE]
[CENTER]Legend [SIZE="3"][COLOR="Red"]INCOMPLETE [COLOR="Orange"]GETTING WORKED ON [COLOR="Lime"]COMEPLETE[/COLOR][/COLOR][/COLOR][/SIZE]
[code][COLOR="Red"]508+ Game Frame[/COLOR] [COLOR="Lime"]474 game frame[/COLOR] [COLOR="Orange"]Customs Items only good ones not stupid shit![/COLOR] [COLOR="Red"]Swats new emote system converted[/COLOR] [COLOR="red"]Swats new 474 animations loader[/COLOR] [COLOR="Red"]100% skill cape emotes done the real way![/COLOR][/code]
[code]COMBAT SYSTEM!
[COLOR="Lime"]Duel arena Pest Control Warriors Guild [COLOR="red"]Bounty Hunter[/COLOR][/COLOR]
[code][SIZE="3"]MINIGAMES!!![/SIZE]
[ul][*]100% dueling [*]Staking works 100% and cannot be glitched. [*]No duping. [*]If you logout in a duel they win. [*]If it's a server glitch, you both keep items. [*]Disabling each type of combat works perfectly. [*]Disabling potions, food, and prayer all work perfectly. [*]Fun weapons works. [*]No special attacks works. [*]No forfeit works. [*]Obstacles works. [*]No movement works. [*]Handled.[/ul]
[/code]
[code][SIZE="3"] Combat System!!![/SIZE]
[ul][*]Magic System [*]Every single spell works with projectiles and effects. [*]Teleother does not work, no point at this point. [*]Every spell that should freeze the other player, does. [*]Need to improve and work on some things such as maging after a melee/ranged attack. [*]Maging from a distance works, chasing if they run works. [*]Handled.[/ul]
[ul][*]Ranged System [*]Ranging from a distance works 100%, chasing if they run works. [*]If you aren't within a certain distance you walk up until you are within a good distance to range. [*]Bows require arrows unless it's a crystal bow. [*]Each arrow has correct projectiles, distance is 100% accurate. [*]Arrows will follow the player if they are moving. [*]Hits only appear when arrow reaches player. [*]Handled.[/ul]
[ul][*]Melee System [*]Cannot move if frozen. Can't glitch or attack from that distance if frozen. [*]Good bonus/defence system implemented, will improve later. [*]Bonuses do affect your hits. [*]Special attack system implemented(my own system). [*]Draining/filling works. [*]Handled.[/ul]
[/code]
[code][SIZE="3"]PVP[/SIZE]
[ul][*]PKing in the wild added. [*]Wilderness levels. [*]Items dropped upon death. [*]Four items kept, depending on value. [*]Skulled when you are the first attacker. [*]Timers work, skull disappears eventually. [*]You lose all items upon death unless you have protect items on.[/ul]
[ul][*]Following when player runs. [*]You don't stop attacking if they run. [*]Multi areas added. [*]Multiple combat works 100%. [*]Multi-icon appears if in a multi area.[/ul]
[ul][*]Eating/item clicking. [*]Timers work correctly. [*]Almost every food added for eating. [*]Bone burying. [*]Handled, of course.[/ul] [/code]
Name: Age: Email: Position: Experience: Why do you wish to join?: Can we trust you?: Will you stick with us?[/CENTER]
[code] Positions ~Owner~ ---- Zerked Up
~Server Programmer~ ---- (OPEN) (OPEN)
~Graphic Artists~ ---- (OPEN) (OPEN)
~Forums/Website Designer~ (OPEN) (OPEN)
__________________[/code]

item.title: Project Snow Can u Handle it?
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

[quote=“the elve age, post:4, topic:341537”]I left the page as soon as I saw the title.

“You” not “u”[/quote]

because everyone on the internet uses correct grammar 100% of the time.
stop trying to get post count up.

OT: it would be nice to get pictures…

Read full topic

item.title: Project Snow Can u Handle it?
item.dc:creator: @zerked_up zerked up
item.description:
@zerked_up wrote:

I well be updating this thread every hour or so!

Well Im finally moving on....From delta..........To Pali's Battlescape base i heard its very good So if u would like to be a part of this project just follow directions below :D

[CENTER]Legend
[SIZE=“3”][COLOR=“Red”]INCOMPLETE
[COLOR=“Orange”]GETTING WORKED ON
[COLOR=“Lime”]COMEPLETE[/COLOR][/COLOR][/COLOR][/SIZE]

[COLOR="Red"]508+ Game Frame[/COLOR] [COLOR="Lime"]474 game frame[/COLOR] [COLOR="Orange"]Customs Items only good ones not stupid shit![/COLOR] [COLOR="Red"]Swats new emote system converted[/COLOR] [COLOR="red"]Swats new 474 animations loader[/COLOR] [COLOR="Red"]100% skill cape emotes done the real way![/COLOR]

[code]COMBAT SYSTEM!

[COLOR=“Lime”]Duel arena
Pest Control
Warriors Guild
[COLOR=“red”]Bounty Hunter[/COLOR][/COLOR]

[code][SIZE=“3”]MINIGAMES!!![/SIZE]

[ul][]100% dueling
[]Staking works 100% and cannot be glitched.
[]No duping.
[]If you logout in a duel they win.
[]If it’s a server glitch, you both keep items.
[]Disabling each type of combat works perfectly.
[]Disabling potions, food, and prayer all work perfectly.
[]Fun weapons works.
[]No special attacks works.
[]No forfeit works.
[]Obstacles works.
[]No movement works.
[*]Handled.[/ul]

[/code]

[code][SIZE=“3”] Combat System!!![/SIZE]

[ul][]Magic System
[]Every single spell works with projectiles and effects.
[]Teleother does not work, no point at this point.
[]Every spell that should freeze the other player, does.
[]Need to improve and work on some things such as maging after a melee/ranged attack.
[]Maging from a distance works, chasing if they run works.
[*]Handled.[/ul]

[ul][]Ranged System
[]Ranging from a distance works 100%, chasing if they run works.
[]If you aren’t within a certain distance you walk up until you are within a good distance to range.
[]Bows require arrows unless it’s a crystal bow.
[]Each arrow has correct projectiles, distance is 100% accurate.
[]Arrows will follow the player if they are moving.
[]Hits only appear when arrow reaches player.
[]Handled.[/ul]

[ul][]Melee System
[]Cannot move if frozen. Can’t glitch or attack from that distance if frozen.
[]Good bonus/defence system implemented, will improve later.
[]Bonuses do affect your hits.
[]Special attack system implemented(my own system).
[]Draining/filling works.
[*]Handled.[/ul]

[/code]

[code][SIZE=“3”]PVP[/SIZE]

[ul][]PKing in the wild added.
[]Wilderness levels.
[]Items dropped upon death.
[]Four items kept, depending on value.
[]Skulled when you are the first attacker.
[]Timers work, skull disappears eventually.
[*]You lose all items upon death unless you have protect items on.[/ul]

[ul][]Following when player runs.
[]You don’t stop attacking if they run.
[]Multi areas added.
[]Multiple combat works 100%.
[*]Multi-icon appears if in a multi area.[/ul]

[ul][]Eating/item clicking.
[]Timers work correctly.
[]Almost every food added for eating.
[]Bone burying.
[*]Handled, of course.[/ul]
[/code]

Name:
Age:
Email:
Position:
Experience:
Why do you wish to join?:
Can we trust you?:
Will you stick with us?[/CENTER]

[code]
Positions
~Owner~

Zerked Up

~Server Programmer~

(OPEN)
(OPEN)

~Graphic Artists~

(OPEN)
(OPEN)

~Forums/Website Designer~
(OPEN)
(OPEN)

__________________[/code]
